domains: Cross-modal reasoning, referring expression comprehension, scene knowledge
methods: The paper proposes LG-R-NET, a language-guided referring expression comprehension network that separates text and image modalities and introduces a cross-attention mechanism to avoid text information being overwhelmed. It also proposes a simplified scene knowledge method and the SKRN model for scene knowledge reasoning.
